description:
Spacious 2nd floor duplex has 2 baths/fully equipped kitchen including a dishwasher and has a full size washer & dyer.  Plenty of towels and linens are provided. Its located near Columbia Univ. & City College. The entrance to Riverbank State Park is just down the block. Easy subway/bus access! #1 train W137th St. station only block away and the bus stop is just around the corner. Groceries stores, restaurants and shopping are all within walking distance.

You’ll love my place because of the location, the people, the outdoors space, the neighborhood, and the ambiance. My place is good for couples, families (with kids), and big groups.

Mi casa es su casa.
While you're occupying the space please treat it as if it were your own.

1 block from the Train station and bus stop
10-15 min train ride to midtown
name: Harlem/Hamilton Hts 3BR/2 bath 2nd flr DUPLEX+YARD
review: Excelente lugar, es mejor que en las fotos mostradas, es como estar en casa y la anfitriona es una estupenda y linda persona.
